item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 8, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. "Now What?" by John Hopfield (2018) [pdf] (21 points | discuss)

3. Show HN: Winamp and other media players, rebuilt for the web with Web Components (104 points | 28 comments)

7. X reinstated in Brazil after complying with court demands (20 points | 1 comment)

24. ABC News hacks into popular robot vacuum, watches owner through camera (171 points | 52 comments)

26. A popular but wrong way to convert a string to uppercase or lowercase (106 points | 120 comments)
27. End of the road for Google Drive in Transmit (254 points | 131 comments)
28. The real data wall is billions of years of evolution (71 points | 40 comments)
29. Unicode shenanigans: Martine Ã©crit en UTF-8 (38 points | 4 comments)
